p: NAFLD fuels in a closed loop the epidemics of type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM) and metabolic syndrome [ 5], almost doubling the risk of developing these disorders [ 6]. Notably, NAFLD is regarded as an even stronger predictor for the development of T2DM then waist circumference or obesity [ 7], and the degree of histologic liver damage is directly related to the presence of diabetes in morbidly obese patients [ 8].
